PHRASE.LANG: Creepy Peep is a playful little monster who wants to be your friend! As a Companion Peep, he will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Creepy Peep est un petit monstre joueur qui veut être ton ami! Comme Compagnon Peep, il te suivra partout et va être ton meilleur pote.[#Legal]
Creepy Peep ist ein verspieltes kleines Monster, das dein Freund sein will! Als Freundschafts-Peep wird er dir zu Hause überall hin folgen und ist dein bester Freund.[#Legal]
Creepy Peep é un mostro giocherellone che vuol diventare il tuo amico! Come Companion Peep, ti seguirá in casa e diventerá il tuo migliore amico.[#Legal]
Creepy Peep es un monstruo juguetón que quiere ser tu cuate! Como Companion Peep, te seguirá a tu casa y será tu mejor cuate.[#Legal]
Creepy Peep은 장난끼 많은 작은 몬스터 친구입니다! 컴패니언 Peep으로 온 집안을 졸졸 따라다니며 당신의 가장 친한 친구가 되고 싶어합니다. [#Legal]
Creepy Peep is a playful little monster who wants to be your friend! As a Companion Peep, he will follow you throughout PS Home and will be your best buddy. [#Legal]
Creepy Peep是調皮的小怪物，他想要成為您的朋友！作為隨身夥伴Peep，他會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Creepy Peep是調皮的小怪物，他想要成為您的朋友！作為隨身夥伴Peep，他會在PS Home伴您左右，成為您的好朋友。 [#Legal]
Creepy Peep is a playful little monster who wants to be your friend! As a Companion Peep, he will follow you throughout Home and will be your best buddy.[#Legal]
